About us

We are a team of professionals in IT infrastructure.

Our Mission

We are a team of professionals in IT infrastructure. We are applying the most effective and cost-wise instruments and environments to make your business grow faster. Nevertheless, with hundreds of cutting-edge tools and solutions for IT infrastructure, like IaaC, microservices, serverless architecture, DevOps, etc, we always look back at our client’s business interests first. We are a small private company, we greatly value our reputation, and therefore take every client’s task as a personal and demanding challenge.

Our Values

Management:

Alexander Kiryushin

10 years of work in sales and marketing in various IT companies (data centers and IT consulting).
Founder of ITHusky. Holds to customer-oriented business approach, and perfectionism in providingthe solutions. Responsible for strategy, customer relations, promotion and marketing.

Alexander Kiryushin

Open-minded DevOps Engineer with strong Linux background and 7+ years of hands-on experience in designing, implementing and managing various deployment types. Highly responsible and dedicated to improving configuration management, CI/CD, and DevOps processes. Interested in Automation, Containerization, and Clouds. Big fan of Infrastructure as a Code (IoC) and Kubernetes. Responsible for technology stack and solutions delivery.
